item.title: Laravel Tutorial
item.description: Create New Project: feature/lsapp ref: https://github.com/bradtraversy/lsapp 1$ diff .env-example .env-lsapp 21,2c1,2 3< #COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=myproject 4< PROJECT_PATH=./src 5--- 6> COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=lsapp 7> PROJECT_PATH=./src-lsapp 84a5 9> APP_NAME=LSAPP 10 11$ make create-project 12docker-compose up -d --build 13docker-compose exec app composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel . 14docker-compose exec app composer require predis/predis 15sudo chown -R tkondoh:tkondoh ./src-lsapp 16 17$ make ps 18docker-compose ps 19 Name Command State Ports 20------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 21lsapp_app_1 docker-php-entrypoint php-fpm Up 0.0.0.0:18000->8000/tcp, 9000/tcp 22lsapp_db-testing_1 docker-entrypoint.

item.title: Laravel Setup
item.description: Laravel refs: https://qiita.com/ucan-lab/items/17c806973e69792ada99#docker%E7%92%B0%E5%A2%83%E3%82%92%E6%A7%8B%E7%AF%89%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B spec: nginx mysql phpmyadmin node redis mailhog Setup GitHub Create repogitory on GitHub: laravel Setup WorkDir 1$ mkdir -p work-github/laravel 2$ cd work-github/laravel 3$ echo "# laravel" >> README.md 4$ git init 5$ git add README.md 6$ git commit -m "first commit" 7$ git remote add origin https://github.com/tkondoh1022/laravel.git 8$ git push -u origin master Setup files 1$ tree . 2. 3├── LICENSE 4├── Makefile 5├── README.
